ability of clinicians to follow these guidelines should be documented and sent to management.
Although great care has been taken to avoid any errors or omissions in preparing these guidelines, there exists the 
potential for both factual errors and differences of opinion. Clinicians should consult other sources of information, 
particularly if there is any doubt, including product information sheets for drug dosages. T
